message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for both of us, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can work within my budget if we can agree on a price of $9,000. I'm looking forward to your response!

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer and understand you're trying to stay within your budget. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $9,000 is just too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500? This would still allow me to make a profit while giving you a fair price. Let's see if we can reach an agreement!

Hello Alice, I've reviewed your latest offer and I'm glad you're willing to negotiate. I'd like to propose a price of $10,000 for the product. I believe this strikes a good balance between our interests and I hope we can come to an agreement.
